Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'A wasteland is not just a barren field. It is also a land with hostile weather.'}
{3: 'For example, the heat at noon can kill a horse, while the temperature at night can freeze a man.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory394.jpg'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "****ing hell! I haven't even asked you to pay me back for my bike!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Noctis, hand me the rope.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'W-wait! What are you doing?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Beardy nervously protects the pile of "motorcycle" while his teeth chatter loudly.'}
{3: 'Vera threatening to tie him up with a rope would not have scared him this much, but on a freezing night like this, he cannot stop shaking.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "We're just taking some gas. What's the matter, man?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Look at the state of your bike. Recycle things! Save the planet!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Know your place. We're only bringing you with us out of the kindness of our hearts.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'But this is my only bike! I was going to fix it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Fine. I won't use it, then.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We Constructs won't freeze to death, anyway. You, on the other hand, probably won't survive until morning.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Vera chuckles and throws the rope at Beardy's feet without saying another word."}
{3: 'Awoooo—'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Rustling, No. 21 walks out behind a giant rock.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey, 21! Where have you been?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'I kept hearing howling... What is that?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'With the help of the moonlight, Noctis notices a struggling, furry creature in between No. 21 claws.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'There are other wolves here. I saw them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'They wanted to eat , but there are still a few movies I want to watch.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'So I convinced them to leave. I caught this on my way back.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Awoooo—'}
{3: 'The wolves howl nearby once again, and No. 21 responds accordingly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Is that the prey you brought back?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Why did you catch it? It's no use to us. Let it go—", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "Beardy's voice is still shaking, but everyone from Cerberus can understand what he is trying to say."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Beardy', 3: "Save some for me. That's good oil.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "And... let's start a fire.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory394.jpg'}
{3: "A single column of smoke splits the dark blue sky in two, starkly contrasting with the wilderness' nocturnal expanse."}
{3: 'The smoke flows upward as if it is a river among the stars.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Do you want a piece?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "It smells good, but I don't need to eat.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'What a shame. Rabbits are tasty.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Is there extra? I'll take some.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis gathers around the campfire and instinctively moves the bomb he carries behind him.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Beardy cuts a slice of meat from the roasted rabbit and hands it to No. 21 before cutting another one and stuffing it in his mouth. Then he hands Noctis his knife.'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "You're a grown man. Do it yourself.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis nods and takes the knife from Beardy, cutting a slice of rabbit meat and eating it.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I knew the taste better when I was human...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Of course. It's meat. Meat is always great.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noctis flips the knife around and hands it to  in one swift motion.'}
{3: "Beardy's lips curl slightly, and he chuckles."}
{3: 'Beardy flips the knife around in his hand.'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'You pointed the knife at yourself when you passed it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "That's a simple etiquette from the Golden Age. Most humans have forgotten about it nowadays, and yet a Construct still remembers.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Oh. Old habits.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'What about Captain? She should try it too.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "She's up there keeping watch.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis points at the figure sitting on top of the giant rock.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey, Captain! Want to come down and have a snack?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "See? That's how she is.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "But I've remembered how to do this.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'After seeing it done once?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Yes. Skin it, open it up, remove the intestines, and then roast it.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Besides, I know how to roast marshmallows.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "It's not that simple!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "You couldn't have done it before, 21!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Your claws tear everything in halves. There's no way they can do something so delicate.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'But I can make cactus sashimi.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "It tastes like grass, and it's slimy.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'That said, cacti are the only thing that can save lives in this desert.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'In an emergency, you have to rely on a cactus for hydration and sugar.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Those prickles, or leaves, are so troublesome.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Cactus leaves?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "That's right. Those prickles are actually cactus leaves. To prevent water loss and stop other animals from feeding on them, it evolves into its current form.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'They do this to evade their natural predators?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I've seen evolutionary paths like this on a terminal before. I've always been curious about that.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Who knows if they are evading predators or protecting themselves?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Sometimes, the prickles you use to protect yourself can hurt other people... Ouch!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 has taken out another small piece of cactus from who-knows-where and placed it in "Beardy"\'s hand.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Yeah. We should put some needles like this in a bomb next time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Are you... a devil?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I still remember seeing the Strike Hawk members playing a video game.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'There were adorable cacti in the game, and they would grow...', 4: '3'}
{3: "A single column of smoke splits the dark blue sky in two, starkly contrasting with the wilderness' nocturnal expanse."}
{3: 'The smoke flows upward as if it is a river among the stars...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory394.jpg'}
{3: 'By the time the sizzling sound and the smell of the roasted meat fade, Cerberus and  are already on the road again.'}
{3: "Since Beardy's motorcycle does not have a lot of fuel to begin with, the Cerberus members have to follow his guidance and head for the next settlement on the way to resupply."}
{3: 'Noctis, No. 21, and Beardy get more and more familiar with each other on this journey of modest length.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "You've also been to Con... Con-something.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Constellia. Your tin brain can't remember anything.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Beardy', 3: 'I was just passing by. I was mostly there to help out an old friend.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "Although I didn't find her there...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Is that it?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Vera interrupts the three of them. She points at a dark shape in the near distance and asks.'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "That's it. That's the place.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'It seems empty. Why would no one turn on their lights otherwise...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'Curfew. They only turn their lights on at night in special times. This is how they protect themselves.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "You're not lying to us, are you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: 'What do I get out of tricking you? I was going to show a movie in this town.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "And I think they'll be happy to receive you.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Beardy', 3: "The asshole in the mechanic's shop was a notorious gang leader in this area. He led a gang of thugs called Van Diesels and threatened the residents with their mechanoids and Corrupted.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "I imagine they'll appreciate you for taking care of him.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What was his deal? Why did he have mechanoids and the Corrupted working for him?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Beardy', 3: "Who knows? This is no man's land. Perhaps he got really lucky.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Alright. It's right ahead of us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We'll find out when we get there.", 4: '1'}
